Scaling the 2D sketch using the sketch_scale scaling parameter with a value of 0.0185. Now, transform the scaled 2D sketch into a 3D sketch using the given euler angles and translation vector. The final dimensions of the part are approximately 0.0185 in length, 0.375 in width, and 0.0185 in height. With this, we have created a long, thin, rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom. Make sure to save the current part as part_1 before proceeding with the next part.</description>
